snippet: Marnie Mueller, the author of a novel about the Tule Lake camp in California, praises the decision to cancel the sale of art made in the camps where Japanese-Americans were interned during World War II.
lead_paragraph: Marnie Mueller, the author of a novel about the Tule Lake camp in California, praises the decision to cancel the sale of art made in the camps where Japanese-Americans were interned during World War II.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
